author: billbarker
msg: Integrate the MappingData with the Request.

author: billbarker
msg: Set the ContextCL before loading loading EmbededTomcat.
EmbededTomcat will reset it, but this seems to make log4j configuration easier.

author: billbarker
msg: For backwards compatability, default the strategy to leader/follower.

author: billbarker
msg: Set the correct query-string on forwards.
The parameters are the sum of the forward URI and the request URI, but the query-string is the one from the forward URI according to the spec.
This still needs some work to handle the post-request clean-up.
